verses.verse: It<WG2532> happened<WG1096> that when<WG3753> Jesus<WG2424> had finished<WG5055> directing<WG1299> his<WG846> twelve<WG1427> disciples,<WG3101> he departed<WG3327> from there<WG1564> to teach<WG1321> and<WG2532> preach<WG2784> in<WG1722> their<WG846> cities.<WG4172>
Now when<WG1161> John<WG2491> heard<WG191> in<WG1722> the prison<WG1201> the works<WG2041> of Christ,<WG5547> he sent<WG3992> two<WG1417> of<WG3101> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>
and said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> "Are<WG1488> you<WG4771> he who comes,<WG2064> or<WG2228> should we look for<WG4328> another?<WG2087>"
Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> them,<WG846> "Go<WG4198> and tell<WG518> John<WG2491> the<WG518> things which<WG3739> you hear<WG191> and<WG2532> see:<WG991>

the blind<WG5185> receive their sight,<WG308> the<WG2532> lame<WG5560> walk,<WG4043> the lepers<WG3015> are cleansed,<WG2511> the<WG2532> deaf<WG2974> hear,<WG191> the dead<WG3498> are raised up,<WG1453> and<WG2532> the poor<WG4434> have good news preached to them.<WG2097>
Blessed<WG3107> is<WG2076> he who<WG3739> finds<WG1437> no<WG3361> occasion<WG4624> for stumbling<WG4624> in<WG1722> me.<WG1698>"

As<WG1161> these<WG5130> went<WG4198> their way,<WG2424> Jesus began<WG756> to say<WG3004> to the multitudes<WG3793> concerning<WG4012> John,<WG2491> "What<WG5101> did you go out<WG1831> into<WG1519> the wilderness<WG2048> to see?<WG2300> A reed<WG2563> shaken<WG4531> by<WG4531> the wind?<WG417>

But<WG235> what<WG5101> did you go out<WG1831> to see?<WG1492> A<WG294> man<WG444> in<WG294> soft<WG3120> clothing?<WG2440> Behold,<WG2400> those who<WG3588> wear<WG5409> soft<WG3120> clothing are<WG1526> in<WG1722> king<WG935>'s houses.<WG3624>
But<WG235> why<WG5101> did you go out?<WG1831> To see<WG1492> a prophet?<WG4396> Yes,<WG3483> I tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> and<WG2532> much more than<WG4053> a prophet.<WG4396>

For<WG1063> this<WG3778> is<WG2076> he,<WG4012> of whom<WG3739> it is written,<WG1125> <WG2400> 'Behold, I<WG1473> send<WG649> my<WG3450> messenger<WG32> before<WG4253> your<WG4675> face,<WG4383> who<WG3739> will prepare<WG2680> your<WG4675> way<WG3598> before<WG1715> you.<WG4675>'

Most certainly<WG281> I tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> among<WG1722> those who are born<WG1084> of women<WG1135> there has<WG1453> not<WG3756> arisen<WG1453> anyone greater than<WG3187> John<WG2491> the Baptizer;<WG910> yet<WG1161> he who is least<WG3398> in<WG1722> the Kingdom<WG932> of Heaven<WG3772> is<WG2076> greater than<WG3187> he.<WG846>

From<WG575> the days<WG2250> of John<WG2491> the Baptizer<WG910> until<WG2193> now,<WG737> the Kingdom<WG932> of Heaven<WG3772> suffers violence,<WG973> and<WG2532> the violent<WG973> take<WG726> it<WG846> by force.<WG726>
For<WG1063> all<WG3956> the prophets<WG4396> and<WG2532> the law<WG3551> prophesied<WG4395> until<WG2193> John.<WG2491>
If<WG1487> you are willing<WG2309> to receive<WG1209> it,<WG846> this is<WG2076> Elijah,<WG2243> who<WG3588> is<WG3195> to come.<WG2064>
He who has<WG2192> ears<WG3775> to hear,<WG191> let him hear.<WG191>

"But<WG1161> to<WG5101> what shall I compare<WG3666> this<WG3778> generation?<WG1074> It is<WG2076> like children<WG3808> sitting<WG2521> in<WG1722> the marketplaces,<WG2532> who call to their<WG846> companions<WG3664>

and<WG2532> say,<WG3004> <WG832> 'We played the flute for you,<WG5213> and<WG2532> you<WG5213> didn't<WG3756> dance.<WG3738> We mourned<WG2354> for you,<WG5213> and<WG2532> you<WG5213> didn't<WG3756> lament.<WG2875>'
For<WG1063> John<WG2491> came<WG2064> neither<WG3383> eating<WG2068> nor<WG3383> drinking,<WG4095> and<WG2532> they say,<WG3004> <WG2192> 'He has a demon.<WG1140>'

The Son<WG5207> of Man<WG444> came<WG2064> eating<WG2068> and<WG2532> drinking,<WG4095> and<WG2532> they say,<WG3004> <WG2400> 'Behold, a gluttonous<WG5314> man<WG444> and<WG2532> a drunkard,<WG3630> a friend<WG5384> of tax collectors<WG5057> and<WG2532> sinners!<WG268>' But<WG2532> wisdom<WG4678> is justified<WG1344> by her<WG846> children.<WG5043>"

Then<WG5119> he<WG756> began to denounce<WG3679> the cities<WG4172> in<WG1722> which<WG3739> most<WG4118> of<WG1411> his<WG846> mighty works<WG1411> had been done,<WG1096> because<WG3754> they didn't<WG3756> repent.<WG3340>

"Woe<WG3759> to you,<WG4671> Chorazin!<WG5523> Woe<WG3759> to you,<WG4671> Bethsaida!<WG966> For<WG3754> if<WG1487> the mighty works<WG1411> had been done<WG1096> in<WG1722> Tyre<WG5184> and<WG2532> Sidon<WG4605> which were done<WG1096> in<WG1722> you,<WG3340> they would have<WG302> repented<WG3340> long ago<WG3819> in<WG1722> sackcloth<WG4526> and<WG2532> ashes.<WG4700>
But<WG4133> I tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> it will be<WG2071> more tolerable<WG414> for Tyre<WG5184> and<WG2532> Sidon<WG4605> on the day<WG2250> of judgment<WG2920> than<WG2228> for you.<WG5213>

You,<WG4771> Capernaum,<WG2584> who are exalted<WG5312> to<WG2193> heaven,<WG3772> you<WG4771> will go down<WG2601> to<WG2193> Hades.<WG86> For<WG3754> if<WG1487> the mighty works<WG1411> had been done<WG1096> in<WG1722> Sodom which were done<WG1096> in<WG1722> you,<WG4671> it<WG3306> would have<WG302> remained<WG3306> until<WG3360> this day.<WG4594>

But<WG4133> I tell<WG3004> you<WG5213> that<WG3754> it will be<WG2071> more tolerable<WG414> for the land<WG1093> of Sodom,<WG4670> on<WG1722> the day<WG2250> of judgment,<WG2920> than<WG2228> for you.<WG4671>"

At<WG1722> that<WG1565> time,<WG2540> Jesus<WG2424> answered,<WG611> "I<WG2036> thank<WG1843> you,<WG4671> Father,<WG3962> Lord<WG2962> of heaven<WG3772> and<WG2532> earth,<WG1093> that you<WG4671> hid<WG613> these things<WG5023> from<WG575> the wise<WG4680> and<WG2532> understanding,<WG4908> and<WG2532> revealed<WG601> them<WG846> to infants.<WG3516>
Yes,<WG3483> Father,<WG3962> for<WG3754> so<WG3779> it was<WG1096> well-pleasing<WG2107> in<WG1715> your sight.<WG4675>

All things<WG3956> have been delivered<WG3860> to me<WG3427> by<WG5259> my<WG3450> Father.<WG3962> No<WG2532> one<WG3762> knows<WG1921> the Son,<WG5207> except<WG1487> the<WG3361> Father;<WG3962> neither<WG3761> does anyone<WG5100> know<WG1921> the Father,<WG3962> except<WG1487> the<WG3361> Son,<WG5207> and<WG2532> he to whom<WG3739> the<WG1437> Son<WG5207> desires<WG1014> to reveal him.<WG601>
"Come<WG1205> to<WG4314> me,<WG3165> all<WG3956> you who labor<WG2872> and<WG2532> are heavily burdened,<WG5412> and I<WG2504> will give<WG373> you<WG5209> rest.<WG373>

Take<WG142> my<WG3450> yoke<WG2218> upon<WG1909> you,<WG5209> and<WG2532> learn<WG3129> from<WG575> me,<WG1700> for<WG3754> I am<WG1510> gentle<WG4235> and<WG2532> lowly<WG5011> in heart;<WG2588> and<WG2532> you will find<WG2147> rest<WG372> for<WG5590> your<WG5216> souls.<WG5590>
For<WG1063> my<WG3450> yoke<WG2218> is easy,<WG5543> and<WG2532> my<WG3450> burden<WG5413> is<WG2076> light.<WG1645>"
